page.title: 01VILLAGE LIFE IN WESTONING:1
page.content: Westoning is a thriving community, having a population of about 1800, and a wide range of activities for all ages. For mothers with young children, there is a{Mother and Toddler Group. As the children grow older, they progress to the village{Playgroup}for ages 3-5, then on to the{Lower School which is situated next to the {playground/recreation ground}in the centre of the village. The school has its own{swimming pool.}From the age of 9+, the children are taken by bus to Middle and Upper Schools outside the village. Activities for the children include { {Brownies, Guides, Cubs, Scouts}and{ {Pony Club.}There is a{Youth Club}on Tuesday evenings for the older children.
